title: Sound On: House Passes Omnibus, Ukraine Aid
itunes:title: Sound On: House Passes Omnibus, Ukraine Aid
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Joe speaks with Rep. Kevin Brady, US Congressman for Texas's 8th congressional district, Ranking Chair of the House Ways and Means Committee, Bill Hoagland, Senior Vice President at the Bipartisan Policy Institute, Former-Director of Budget and Appropriations in the office of Senate Majority Leader Bill Frist, and Sound On panelists, Jeanne Sheehan Zaino, Professor of Political Science at Iona College and Bloomberg Contributor, and Rick Davis, Bloomberg Contributor and Partner at Stonecourt Capital.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
